TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlConvert extends System.Object

summary.span: 編碼和解碼 XML 名稱，並且提供在 Common Language Runtime 類型和 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 類型之間轉換的方法。

span.span: Encodes and decodes XML names, and provides methods for converting between common language runtime types and XML Schema definition language (XSD) types.

summary.span: 轉換資料類型時，傳回的值與地區設定無關。

span.span: When converting data types, the values returned are locale-independent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別在功能上等於類別，但它支援 XML 標準。The class is functionally equivalent to the class, but it supports XML standards. 這種型別系統的架構是 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 的結構描述型別，因此傳回的值一律不受地區設定影響。The type system is based on the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema type, and the values returned are always locale-independent. ## 編碼和解碼Encoding and decoding 項目和屬性的名稱或 ID 值受限於範圍的 XML 字元，根據 W3C [XML 1.0 版建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。Element and attribute names or ID values are limited to a range of XML characters according to the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). 當名稱包含無效的字元時，您可以使用和這個類別，以將它們轉譯成有效的 XML 名稱中的方法。When names contain invalid characters, you can use the and methods in this class to translate them into valid XML names. 例如，如果您想要使用的資料行標題在資料庫中的 [訂單詳細資料]，資料庫可讓兩個字之間的間距。For example, if you want to use the column heading "Order Detail" in a database, the database allows the space between the two words. 不過，在 XML 中，[順序] 和 [詳細資料] 之間的空間視為無效的 XML 字元。However, in XML, the space between "Order" and "Detail" is considered an invalid XML character. 您必須將它轉換成逸出的十六進位編碼方式，並稍後再將它解碼。You have to convert it into an escaped hexadecimal encoding and decode it later. 您可以使用方法使用類別，以確保寫入的名稱是有效的 XML 名稱。You can use the method with the class to ensure the names being written are valid XML names. 下列 C# 程式碼將 [訂單詳細資料] 的名稱轉換成有效的 XML 名稱，並寫入項目`My order`。The following C# code converts the name "Order Detail" into a valid XML name and writes the element `My order`. ```csharp writer.WriteElementString(XmlConvert.EncodeName("Order Detail"),"My order"); ``` 下列方法執行編碼和解碼。The following methods perform encoding and decoding. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||將名稱，並傳回編碼的名稱，以及由逸出字串取代任何無效字元。Takes a name and returns the encoded name along with any invalid character that is replaced by an escape string. 這個方法允許冒號出現在任何位置，也就是說，名稱可能仍會根據 W3C 無效[Namespaces in XML 1.0 建議事項](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names)。This method allows colons in any position, which means that the name may still be invalid according to the W3C [Namespaces in XML 1.0 recommendation](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names).| ||將名稱，並傳回編碼的名稱。Takes a name and returns the encoded name.| ||與相同不同之處在於它也會編碼冒號字元，保證可用來當做名稱`LocalName`的命名空間限定名稱的一部分。Same as except that it also encodes the colon character, guaranteeing that the name can be used as the `LocalName` part of a namespace-qualified name.| ||反轉所有編碼方法的轉換。Reverses the transformation for all the encoding methods.| ## 名稱驗證Name validation 類別包含兩個方法，檢查中的項目或屬性名稱的字元，並確認名稱是否符合 W3C 所設定的規則[XML 1.0 版建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/):The class contains two methods that check the characters in an element or attribute name and verify that the name conforms to the rules set by the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/): - 檢查字元，並確認名稱有效。 checks the characters and verifies that the name is valid. 如果它是有效的並擲回例外狀況，如果不是，這個方法會傳回名稱。The method returns the name if it's valid, and throws an exception if it isn't. - 執行相同的驗證，但可接受非限定名稱。 performs the same validation, but accepts non-qualified names. 包含驗證權杖、 泛空白字元、 公用識別碼和其他字串的其他方法。The contains additional methods that validate tokens, white-space characters, public IDs, and other strings. ## 資料類型轉換Data type conversion 也提供可讓您將資料從字串轉換成強類型的資料類型方法。 also provides methods that enable you to convert data from a string to a strongly typed data type. 例如，方法將字串轉換成其相等。For example, the method converts a string to its equivalent. 使用此方法因為中的大部分方法類別傳回的資料，做為字串。This is useful because most methods in the class return data as a string. 讀取資料之後，可以會轉換成適當的資料類型，然後用它。After the data is read, it can be converted to the proper data type before being used. 多載會提供互補的作業，藉由將強型別的資料轉換為字串。The overloads provide the complementary operation by converting strongly typed data to strings. 比方說，這是很有用時您想要將資料加入至網頁上的文字方塊中。For example, this is useful when you want to add the data to text boxes on a webpage. 地區設定不會納入帳戶在資料轉換。Locale settings are not taken into account during data conversion. 資料類型會根據 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 資料型別。The data types are based on the XML Schema (XSD) data types.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string DecodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function DecodeName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 這個方法反向執行 和 方法。

span.span: This method does the reverse of the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 解碼名稱使用下列規則：The names are decoded using the following rules: - 名稱解碼從左到右。Names are decoded from left to right. - 任何順序 _x `HHHH_` (其中 HHHH 代表有效的四位數十六進位 ucs-2 代碼)，尚未解碼會轉換成對應的 Unicode 2.1 (如果支援的應用程式進行 3.0 Unicode) 字元。Any sequence _x `HHHH_` (where HHHH stands for a valid, four digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code) that has not been decoded is transformed into the corresponding Unicode 2.1 (Unicode 3.0 if supported by the application) character. - 簡短形式不會被辨識。No shortforms are recognized. 它們會傳遞無需進行翻譯。They are passed on without translation. 比方說，_x20\_或 __ 未解碼。For example, _x20\_ or __ are not decoded. > [!NOTE] > 實際的字元編碼為特定應用程式。The actual encoding of the character is application-specific. 例如，Order_x0020_Details 會變成訂單詳細資料。For example, Order_x0020_Details becomes Order Details. 會辨識並解碼 XML 名稱中無效的甚至逸出的字元。Even escaped characters that are invalid in XML names will be recognized and decoded. ## Examples 下列範例名稱編碼及解碼。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeLocalName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeLocalName (name As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 將名稱轉換為有效的 XML 區域名稱。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很類似方法，但它會編碼冒號字元，保證可直接存取可用來當做命名空間限定名稱的本機名稱部分的名稱。This method is similar to the method except that it encodes the colon character, which guarantees that the name can be used as the local name part of a namespace qualified name. 例如，如果您傳遞給這個方法不正確的名稱: b，它會傳回 a_x003a_b，這是有效的本機名稱。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name a:b, it returns a_x003a_b, which is a valid local name. 如果`name`已`null`或`String.Empty`然後取得傳回相同的值。If `name` is `null` or `String.Empty` then you get the same value returned. ## Examples 下列範例名稱編碼及解碼。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeName (name As String) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 將名稱轉換為有效的 XML 名稱。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML name.

returns.span: 傳回以逸出字元取代任何無效字元的名稱。

span.span: Returns the name with any invalid characters replaced by an escape string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會轉譯無效的字元，例如空格或半形片假名，需要對應至 XML 名稱，而不需要支援或結構描述的目前狀態。This method translates invalid characters, such as spaces or half-width Katakana, that need to be mapped to XML names without the support or presence of schemas. 無效的字元轉譯為逸出的數值實體編碼。The invalid characters are translated into escaped numeric entity encodings. 逸出字元是"_"。The escape character is "_". 不符合任何 XML 名稱字元[XML 1.0 規格 （第四版） 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)逸出為 _xHHHH\_。Any XML name character that does not conform to the [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition) recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) is escaped as _xHHHH\_. HHHH 字串代表的字元，最大顯著性位元第一順序四位數字十六進位 ucs-2 代碼。The HHHH string stands for the four-digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code for the character in most significant bit first order. 例如，Order Details 名稱將會編碼成 Order_x0020_Details。For example, the name Order Details is encoded as Order_x0020_Details. 除非底線字元後面跟著和底線連在一起，使得解碼該名稱時會被誤認為逸出序列 (Escape Sequence) 的字元序列，否則並不需要逸出該底線字元。The underscore character does not need to be escaped unless it is followed by a character sequence that together with the underscore can be misinterpreted as an escape sequence when decoding the name. 例如，Order_Details 不會被編碼，但是 Order_x0020_ 會編碼成 Order_x005f_x0020_。For example, Order_Details is not encoded, but Order_x0020_ is encoded as Order_x005f_x0020_. 允許不使用簡短形式。No shortforms are allowed. 例如，表單 _x20\_而且不會產生 __。For example, the forms _x20\_ and __ are not generated. 這個方法可確保根據 XML 規格的名稱無效。This method guarantees the name is valid according to the XML specification. 它允許冒號出現在任何位置，這表示名稱可能仍會根據無效[W3C 命名空間規格](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names)。It allows colons in any position, which means the name may still be invalid according to the [W3C Namespace Specification](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names). 若要確保它是有效的命名空間限定名稱，請使用的前置詞和本機名稱部分，並將結果與冒號。To guarantee it is a valid namespace qualified name use for the prefix and local name parts and join the result with a colon. ## Examples 下列範例名稱編碼及解碼。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function EncodeNmToken (name As String) As String

summary.span: 根據 XML 規格驗證確定名稱有效。

span.span: Verifies the name is valid according to the XML specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可確保名稱是根據 XML 規格的有效。This method guarantees that the name is valid according to the XML specification. 例如，如果您傳遞給這個方法不正確的名稱 70 +，它會傳回 70_x002b_ 也就是有效的 XML 名稱。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name 70+, it returns 70_x002b_ which is a valid XML name. 如果`name`是`null`或 String.Empty，則您可以取得相同的值傳回。If `name` is `null` or String.Empty then you get the same value returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當小數秒數會指定七個以上的數字時，值會四捨五入。When more than seven digits are specified for fractional seconds, the value is rounded. 比方說，00000004 變成 0000000 和 00000005 變成 0000001。For example, 00000004 becomes 0000000 and 00000005 becomes 0000001. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從 XML 檔案讀取字串並用方法，以將字串轉換為型別。The following example demonstrates how to read a string from an XML file and use the method to convert the string to a type. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/CS/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/VB/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.vb#1)] 此範例會使用 transactions.xml 檔案。The example uses the transactions.xml file. ```xml 123456789 1.00 USD 2007-08-03T22:05:13-07:00 ```

exception.span: 傳遞至這個方法的引數是在容許值的範圍之外。

exception.span: 傳遞至這個方法的引數不符合 XML dateTime 型別的 W3C Recommendations 子集。

span.span: The argument passed to this method does not conform to a subset of the W3C Recommendations for the XML dateTime type.

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters in the argument are valid public id characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該會不傳回比傳入的引數的任何其他值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 有效的公用 id 字元不會改變之間 XML 版本中，因此您不`XmlVersion`須有多載。The characters valid for public id do not vary between XML editions, so no `XmlVersion` overload is required. 請參閱[XML 1.0 規格 （第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生產 [13]`PublidChar`如需有關允許的字元See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [13] `PublidChar` for details on the allowed characters 如果參數是 null，`ArgumentNullException`就會擲回。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字元不是有效的公用 id 字元，`XmlException`遇到的第一個無效字元的相關資訊就會擲回。If any of the characters are not valid public id characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyTOKEN(string token) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyTOKEN (token As String) As String

span.span: The string value you wish to verify.

summary.span: 根據＜W3C XML Schema Part2: Datatypes＞建議，驗證字串是否為有效的語彙基元。

span.span: Verifies that the string is a valid token according to the W3C XML Schema Part2: Datatypes recommendation.

returns.span: 語彙基元 (如果它是有效的語彙基元)。

span.span: The token, if it is a valid token.

exception.span: 此字串值不是有效的語彙基元。

span.span: The string value is not a valid token.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyWhitespace(string content) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyWhitespace (content As String) As String

summary.span: 如果字串引數中的所有字元都是有效的空白字元，則會傳回傳入的字串執行個體。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters.

returns.span: 如果字串引數中的所有字元都是有效的空白字元，則會傳回傳入的字串執行個體；否則傳回 。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該會不傳回比傳入的引數的任何其他值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. XML 版本，因此不不需要的任何 xml 版本的多載之間的字元是有效的空白字元，不會改變。The characters that are valid for whitespace do not vary between XML editions, so no xml version overload is required. 請參閱[XML 1.0 規格 （第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生產 [3] S 如需有關允許的字元。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [3] S for details on the allowed characters. 如果參數是 null，`ArgumentNullException`就會擲回。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字元不是有效的空白字元，`XmlException`遇到的第一個無效字元的相關資訊就會擲回。If any of the characters are not valid whitespace characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來偵測無效的字元是否有值，指派給的開始項目中。The following example uses the method to detect the presence of an invalid character in a value assigned to the start element. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/cs/xmlconvertnewverify.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/vb/xmlconvertnewverify.vb#5)]

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters and surrogate-pair characters in the string argument are valid XML characters, otherwise an is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該會不傳回比傳入的引數的任何其他值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 請參閱[XML 1.0 規格 （第四版）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生產 [2]`Char`如需有關允許的字元。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [2] `Char` for details on the allowed characters. 如果參數是 null，`ArgumentNullException`就會擲回。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字元不是有效的 xml 字元`XmlException`會擲回第一個遇到的無效字元的相關資訊。If any of the characters are not valid xml characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法用來偵測的開始項目中的不合法的字元。The following example uses the method used to detect an illegal character in the start element.
